title.rendered: Woolen clothes distributed at Mission Education centre Samarpan

content.rendered: Over 250 children at Smile Foundation’s Mission Education centre – Samarpan receive sweaters, woollen caps, blankets, gloves and other warm clothes to protect them from the dropping temperatures.

excerpt.rendered: Over 250 children at Smile Foundation’s Mission Education centre – Samarpan receive sweaters, woollen caps, blankets, gloves and other warm clothes to protect them from the dropping temperatures.
